_source.title: GC durations [Metricbeat Golang]
_source.visState: {"type": "timelion", "params": {"interval": "10s", "expression": ".es(index=\"metricbeat*\",metric=\"max:golang.heap.gc.pause.sum.ns\").bars().label(\"sum of GC Pause durations(ns)\").yaxis(label=\"Durations(ns)\"),.es(index=\"metricbeat*\",metric=\"max:golang.heap.gc.total_pause.ns\").derivative().movingaverage(30).label(\"Total GC Pause(ns) Rate\"),.es(index=\"metricbeat*\",metric=\"max:golang.heap.gc.pause.max.ns\").label(\"Max GC Pause(ns)\").movingaverage(30),.es(index=\"metricbeat*\",metric=\"avg:golang.heap.gc.pause.avg.ns\").label(\"Avg GC Pause(ns)\").movingaverage(30),.es(index=\"metricbeat*\",metric=\"max:golang.heap.gc.pause.count\").condition(lt,1, null).label(\"GC Pause count\").points().yaxis(2,label=\"Count\")"}, "aggs": [], "title": "GC durations [Metricbeat Golang]"}

_source.visState: {"type": "metrics", "params": {"time_field": "@timestamp", "series": [{"line_width": 1, "point_size": "0", "color": "rgba(211,49,21,1)", "label": "Used", "metrics": [{"field": "system.memory.actual.used.bytes", "type": "avg", "id": "4ff61fd1-1b16-11e7-b09e-037021c4f8df"}], "seperate_axis": 0, "split_mode": "everything", "chart_type": "line", "stacked": "stacked", "axis_position": "right", "formatter": "bytes", "id": "4ff61fd0-1b16-11e7-b09e-037021c4f8df", "fill": "1"}, {"line_width": 1, "point_size": "0", "color": "rgba(0,156,224,1)", "label": "Cache", "metrics": [{"field": "system.memory.actual.used.bytes", "type": "avg", "id": "753a6081-1b16-11e7-b09e-037021c4f8df"}, {"field": "system.memory.used.bytes", "type": "avg", "id": "7c9d3f00-1b16-11e7-b09e-037021c4f8df"}, {"variables": [{"field": "753a6081-1b16-11e7-b09e-037021c4f8df", "id": "890f9620-1b16-11e7-b09e-037021c4f8df", "name": "actual"}, {"field": "7c9d3f00-1b16-11e7-b09e-037021c4f8df", "id": "8f3ab7f0-1b16-11e7-b09e-037021c4f8df", "name": "used"}], "type": "calculation", "id": "869cc160-1b16-11e7-b09e-037021c4f8df", "script": "params.actual != null && params.used != null ?
